sentences.en: Without bothering to dry off, I pulled on my bathrobe.
sentences.cn: 我懒得擦干身子，就穿上了浴衣。

sentences.en: Hundreds of thousands of people sabotaged a question about religion by claiming that they were Jedi, the bathrobe-wearing superheroes of the Star Wars films.
sentences.cn: 成千上万人声称自己是《星际大战》系列电影中穿着浴衣的超级英雄绝地武士，以此捣乱一个关于宗教的提问。

sentences.en: The man wore a bathrobe and had evidently just come from the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 那人穿着浴袍，显然刚从浴室出来。
